english.segment1: I look the part. blend in with the rest of the church crowd. I know the routine. I could list all the bible studies in town. watch christian TV. I know all the preachers..their cliches. been born again, without a doubt I know I'm saved
english.segment2: Chorus. But sometimes I hurt and sometimes I cry. sometimes I can't get it right. no matter how hard I seem to try. sometimes I fall down. stumble over my own disguise. I try to look strong. as the whole world looks on. but sometimes alone I cry
english.segment3: I try to speak faith. never give the devil one inch to get in. I do worship and praise. let everybody know just where that I stand. on the back of my ride is a fish and a cross. for the world to see. I know God is good, all of the time. yes there's no doubt for me
